I

invalidate() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
The method will force a process cycle that may result in an CursorEvents being generated if there is a significant event that affects a Cursor.
IoDevice - Class in org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d
An IoDevice controls the position of the Cursor.
IoDevice(String, int, int, String, String) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Create a new IoDevice.
IoDevice(String, int, int, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Create a new IoDevice.
isActive() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorEvent
Returns the active status of the CursorEvent.
isBusyLoading() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
When the application is working on a task a feedback can be given using the Cursor.setBusyLoading(boolean) call.
isColliding() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorEvent
Returns true if the Cursor is colliding with the corresponding GVRSceneObject.
isConnected() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Get connection state of the IoDevice
isControllerActive - Variable in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
 
isDepthOrderEnabled() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
 
isEnabled() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.Cursor
Use this method to check if the Cursor is enabled or disabled.
isEnabled() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.IoDevice
Returns the state of the IoDevice if enabled or not.
isOver() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorEvent
Use this flag to detect if the input Cursor "is over" the GVRSceneObject.
isSoundEnabled() - Method in class org.gearvrf.io.cursor3d.CursorManager
Gets the status of the Sounds for the CursorManager
